episodes.title: EXCLUSIVE: Jana Duggar NEEDS POLICE to HELP HER LEAVE JIM BOB's HOME  "IT'S WORSE than REPORTED"
episodes.description:
#Duggars #cults #Duggarfamily #Janaduggar #realitytv #iblp 

Jana Duggar's live inside the Duggar compound is worse than reported according to a former friend and church member of the Duggar Family. The source provided insight into the mindset of Jim Bob & why other girls in the group have needed law enforcement to help them leave

episodes.title: Ruby Franke's SHOCKING STATEMENT at SENTENCING PROVES SHE HAS NO REMORSE "JODI MADE ME DO IT!"
episodes.description:
#8passengers #rubyfranke #cults #momsoftruth #connexions #lds 

Ruby Franke & Jodi Hildebrandt appeared in court on February 20, 2024. Ruby made a tearful plea to the court and thanked everyone for helping her kids. Despite taking responsibility, she placed a lot of blame on Jodi. When the court brough in Jodi, the State revealed that Jodi has shown no remorse & continues to blame others and believe what she's done was justified.

episodes.title: “Daughters of the Cult” Anna & Celia LeBaron Expose The Shocking Truth Behind Sister Wives
episodes.description:
#Daughtersofthecult #ervillebaron #mormon #sisterwives 

Anna & Celia LeBaron Join Katie Joy for a 2 hour interview detailing their life inside their father Ervil LeBaron's Polygamous Sect The Church of the Lamb of God. They also have a message for current and former members of the Apostolic United Brethren and seek forgiveness for their father's actions. They also to bridge the gap between both sides of Sister Wives' star Christine Brown. That's right Anna and Celia are Christine's cousin.


Buy Anna's Book Here: https://www.amazon.com/The-Polygamists-Daughter-audiobook/dp/B06XGJ2BTG/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2Y0ZTG3V7DWQB&keywords=anna+lebaron&qid=1707182334&sprefix=anna+lebaron%252Caps%252C152&sr=8-1&_encoding=UTF8&tag=withoutacryst-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=123dd3740280f5d6034d9dc15974e1a0&camp=1789&creative=9325

Daughter's of the Cult is produced by ABC Studios and streaming on Hulu

Interview is approved through ABC STUDIOS
